description: This is my first post with the zzo theme
title: First Post

content: Béla Richartz: Short description: I <3 linux and I am a weeb.   Hey, my name is Béla (Severin) Richartz. I build this Webpage using Hugo, and the Zzo theme. My goal with this webpage is to share my knowledge and experience. English isn’t my first language, so there may be some typos. I will try my best to make this Webpage a nice experience for you and for me. :)
description: Hugo, the world’s fastest framework for building websites
title: About me
